company_mentions: Shanxi Xingsheng Hongfa Coal Industry Co Ltd

The Shanxi Hongfa Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Zhanglanzhuang Village, Jiexiu City, Jinzhong, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Xingsheng Hongfa Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Xingsheng Hongfa Coal Industry Co Ltd, which is fully owned by the Shanxi Government.
